en: *Aaahhh*
"Ah, morning... The finance lecture starts in an hour. I must hurry up, please just don’t interrupt me this time"
Maya gets out of bed carefully, trying not to wake her roommates.
"My room is always neat and clean. Let’s keep it this way."
Maya approaches her desk, turns on her laptop, and tries to connect to Wi-Fi, but with no success.
"Wi-Fi problems again... Why is it always like this? Well, never mind, I have a book version for this."
Maya takes the book out of her backpack and opens it, preparing for the lecture.
"Oh my God, yesterday . . . so much fun! I'm so tired. . ."
"Yeah, me too... These weekends never end. . . call her?"
Maya swallows her irritation and focuses on reading.
Maya exits her room, closing the door.
Come on, Maya, you can handle this. Concentrate on the lecture and let’s push financial problems away for now at least.
. . . Remember, financial literacy is a lifelong process, and the more you educate yourself, the better equipped you'll be to make informed financial decisions.
Thank you all for attending, and have a great day!
"Oh, that lecture was intense. Finance is not the easiest topic."
Hey, Maya! How are you doing, how was the lecture?
Hey, Emily. Well, I’m good, lecture wasn't easy, but I tried to grasp all the important points.
I know finance can be challenging. By the way, I have this super helpful app that might assist you. It's called Financial Life.
Maya looks at Emily with some skepticism.
Financial Life? Sounds like a stock trading program. I'm not sure if you want to help me or bury even deeper.
No, no, it's not about trading ha-ha. Financial Life is an app designed to assist in financial situations.
It provides useful advice and helps with budget planning. It really helped me, believe me.
Maya is still cautiously thinking about this app but decides to give it a chance.
Alright, I'll give it a try. At least to see what it offers.
Great! I'm sure you'll like it. Go ahead, download it, and see what advice it provides.
Suddenly, Maya remembers urgent tasks she has to do.
Oops, sorry, Emily, I have some urgent matters to attend to. I need to leave immediately. But thanks for the recommendation, I'll definitely check the app.
No problem, Maya. Good luck with your tasks! Be sure to let me know about your experience with Financial Life
Maya waves goodbye and hurries off.
"Financial Life... Maybe it can help me heh."
